item.title: Vanilla JavaScript Code Equivalent to jQuery.empty()
item.description: Learn to use vanilla JavaScript code to remove all child elements from a DOM node.

item.title: Is there an 'exists' function in jQuery? (HTML element exists?)
item.description: Learn how to check if an element exists in the HTML page using jQuery in the fastest and simplest way possible.

item.title: Learn How to Use JavaScript hasOwnProperty() Method
item.description: In this short tutorial for beginners, you’ll learn how to use the JavaScript hasOwnProperty() Method in a simple and easy manner.
